example.assistant:output:
English French Explanation
I je "I" is the first person singular subject pronoun in French. eat manger "Eat" is a verb in French. You'll need to conjugate it in the present tense. pizza pizza "Pizza" is the same in French.
Sentence Structure in French:
Subject + verb + object
Hints: In French, the verb "manger" (to eat) needs to be conjugated in the present tense. The subject "I" is "je" in French. The object "pizza" remains the same in French. Now, try to construct the sentence in French using these clues and the vocabulary provided. Once you have your attempt, I can help you interpret it back into English
